name: Jump and Sword
description:
Jump and Sword is a 3D platforming game with some demon hacking and slashing .  It also offers high flying platforming and an epic boss fight. 

Jump and Sword  is being developed by a solo basement dwelling individual.  Currently only supports keyboard and mouse, you can invert the camera using the in-game menu with esc. This is a short demo version. I hope you enjoy playing and I appreciate your support! Thanks for playing!
